headline: Bangladesh Bank Cuts Interest Rates to Boost Economy
description: In a move to stimulate economic activity, Bangladesh Bank has announced a reduction in policy interest rates effective from June.

headline: City Bank Launches New Digital Banking Platform
description: City Bank unveiled its latest digital banking interface, aimed at improving user experience and security for online transactions.

headline: IFIC Bank Reports 20% Growth in Quarterly Profits
description: IFIC Bank's Q1 financial report shows a significant increase in profit due to strong investment returns and customer deposits.

headline: Mobile Banking Transactions Hit Record High
description: Recent data shows mobile banking in Bangladesh crossed BDT 1 trillion in transactions last month, marking a new milestone.

headline: Dutch-Bangla Bank Introduces Contactless ATM Cards
description: Dutch-Bangla Bank has launched contactless debit cards for safer and faster ATM transactions across the country.

headline: BRAC Bank Opens New Branch in Chittagong
description: BRAC Bank expands its presence in the port city by opening a state-of-the-art branch in Agrabad.

headline: Online Account Opening Feature Launched by Eastern Bank
description: Eastern Bank customers can now open savings and current accounts directly from the bank's mobile app.

headline: Bank Asia Implements AI for Fraud Detection
description: Bank Asia has deployed artificial intelligence systems to detect and prevent fraudulent activities in real-time.

headline: Prime Bank Launches Green Loan for Solar Projects
description: Prime Bank introduced an eco-friendly financing option for homeowners installing rooftop solar panels.

headline: Mutual Trust Bank Hosts Financial Literacy Program
description: MTB conducted workshops across rural areas to promote awareness of savings, credit, and digital payments.

headline: Bangladesh Bank Increases Cash Reserve Ratio
description: To curb inflation, the central bank has raised the cash reserve ratio (CRR) for scheduled banks by 0.5%.

headline: Islami Bank Launches Shariah-Based Investment App
description: The bank's new app offers customers a fully digital platform for halal investment products and portfolio tracking.
